tool.name: Pmxanalyse
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the PMX analyse module.

param.name: input_a_xvg_zip_path
param.label: input ZIP file
param.help: Path the zip file containing the dgdl.xvg files of the A state. Format: [input].zip

param.name: input_b_xvg_zip_path
param.label: input ZIP file
param.help: Path the zip file containing the dgdl.xvg files of the B state. Format: [input].zip

param.name: outname_output_result_path
param.label: output TXT name
param.help: Path to the TXT results file Format: [output].txt

param.name: outname_output_work_plot_path
param.label: output PNG name
param.help: Path to the PNG plot results file Format: [output].png

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: method
param.label: method
param.help: Choose one or more estimators to use.

param.name: temperature
param.label: temperature
param.help: Temperature in Kelvin.

param.name: nboots
param.label: nboots
param.help: Number of bootstrap samples to use for the bootstrap estimate of the standard errors.

param.name: nblocks
param.label: nblocks
param.help: Number of blocks to divide the data into for an estimate of the standard error.

param.name: integ_only
param.label: integ_only
param.help: Whether to do integration only.

param.name: reverseB
param.label: reverseB
param.help: Whether to reverse the work values for the backward (B->A) transformation.

param.name: skip
param.label: skip
param.help: Skip files.

param.name: slice
param.label: slice
param.help: Subset of trajectories to analyze. Provide list slice, e.g. "10 50" will result in selecting dhdl_files[10:50].

param.name: rand
param.label: rand
param.help: Take a random subset of trajectories. Default is None (do not take random subset).

param.name: index
param.label: index
param.help: Zero-based index of files to analyze (e.g. "0 10 20 50 60"). It keeps the dhdl.xvg files according to their position in the list, sorted according to the filenames.

param.name: prec
param.label: prec
param.help: The decimal precision of the screen/file output.

param.name: units
param.label: units
param.help: The units of the output.
param.option: kT - the product of the Boltzmann constant k and the temperature

param.name: no_ks
param.label: no_ks
param.help: Whether to do a Kolmogorov-Smirnov test to check whether the Gaussian assumption for CGI holds.

param.name: nbins
param.label: nbins
param.help: Number of histograms bins for the plot.

param.name: dpi
param.label: dpi
param.help: Resolution of the plot.

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Path to the PMX command line interface.
